804 
 
INDUSTRIAL   RELATIONS  
 COVENANT         
  
  
INDUSTRIAL   AND  LABOUR 
RELATIONS  
 OOU               
  
  
  
  
i) Two (2) 'A' 
level passes chosen 
from  
Economics,  
Accounting,  
Government, 
Geography and  
Statistics.   
ii) NCE in related 
programme.  
Five (5) SSC credit passes to 
include English Language 
and Mathematics.  
  
Mathematics,  
Economics plus one 
other relevant  
subject  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i)  CUAB accepts IJMB at acceptable grades.  
  
UTME  
(i)   COVENANT requires  f ive (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Economics one Science subject from 
Biology, Health/General Science, Agricultural Science, Physics 
and Chemistry  and either  Geography, Government, 
Accounts, Book Keeping or Commerce.  
INDUSTRIAL RELATIONS AND  
PERSONNEL MANAGEMENT  
BENIN  
RITMAN  
  
  
Two (2) 'A' level passes 
chosen from Economics,  
Accounting, Business  
Management,  
Government, 
Geography and  
Statistics.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes 
including English Language, 
Mathematics, Economics 
plus any two (2) subjects 
listed under the Direct 
Entry column.  
  
Mathematics, 
Economics and one 
other subject.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i)  Benin accepts  
a. UTME requirements plus two (2) subject passed at 'A' level one 
of which must be Economics, Business Management or 
Mathematics. In exceptional cases, the following qualifications 
may also be considered  
b. UTME requirements plus a complete pass in the intermed iate 
examination of the Chartered Institute of Personnel 
Management of Nigeria (CIPM) or any other Professional Human 
Resources Management body.  
c. UTME requirements plus ND upper credit in Business 
Administration, or any relevant programme.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
 (i)  BENIN accepts Business Method in lieu of Economics.  
  
SOCIOLOGY   
 AAU        
 AAUA         
ABSU  
 ABU        
ABUAD  
ABUJA  
ACHIEVERS  
AL-QALAM  
BASU  
As in Political Science.  
  
As in Political Science.  
  
Three (3) Social 
Science or Arts 
subjects.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) PHC, No direct entry  
(ii) IBADAN accepts two (2) 'A' level passes from Arts, 
Sciences or Social Sciences. (iii) LAGOS accepts   
            a. very good passes in three (3) JUPEB/'A' level subjects and 
any three (3) of Economics, Government, Geography, 
History and Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies.  
(iv) UDU accepts ND credit in Mass Communication and NCE  
Social Studies.  
(v) BENIN as in Social Development and Administration.
